name: Space Hero (GehadAbdElhalim)
description:
Controls :

Slow flying mode : 

- WASD to move 

- Mouse movement to look around

- space to ascend

- Left CTRL to descend

- hold  left Shift to switch to fast flying mode

Fast flying mode :

- mouse movement controls the direction of flight

Bash mechanic :

- Hold Right Mouse Button when near a projectile to enter slow motion aiming mode where you aim using your movement keys towards the direction the you want to launch yourself in

- Release Right Mouse Button to enter Boost mode 

Boost mode ;

- In this mode you can't control the direction of the flight but anything that comes your way will be destroyed.

- Boost mode will end after 5 seconds

- The score increases for every ship destroyed in the Boost mode
